2025 Miami Marlins Statistics

2024 Season

Record: 31-45, 4th place in NL_East (Schedule and Results)

Playoff Odds: <0.1% to make postseason, <0.1% to win World Series

Manager: Clayton McCullough (31-45)

President: Peter Bendix (President, Baseball Operations)

Farm Director: Hector Crespo

Scouting Director: Frankie Piliere

Ballpark: loanDepot park

Attendance: 484,073 (15th of 15)

Park Factors: (Over 100 favors batters, under 100 favors pitchers.)
    Multi-year: Batting - 104, Pitching - 106
    One-year: Batting - 89, Pitching - 91

Pythagorean W-L: 29-47, 306 Runs, 396 Runs Allowed
